AUTHOR: ZeLarpMaster#0818
INSTALL_MSG:
Thanks for installing my voice channel generation cog and enjoy!
To get a category's ID you can right click it and click Copy ID with the developer mode enabled.
To enable the developer go to Settings > Appearance > Advanced > Developer Mode
NAME: VoiceChannelGenerator
SHORT: Keep a fixed number of empty voice channels all the time
DESCRIPTION: Creates new empty voice channels everytime there isn't enough empty voice channels until a maximum number of generated channels has been made.
